forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers this afternoon. High 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, then off and on rain showers for the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.
